name: PublishCustomChannelMessage
description:
Publish a message to a custom channel on HubSpot.

This tool sends a message over a specified custom channel in HubSpot Conversations. Use this tool to communicate via custom-integrated messaging channels.

parameters.name: custom_channel_id
parameters.description: The unique ID of the custom channel where the message will be published. Must be a string.

parameters.name: custom_channel_message_payload
parameters.description: A JSON object containing message details for the custom channel, including message direction, recipients, senders, text, and attachments.

type.description: The type of identifier. HS_EMAIL_ADDRESS for email addresses; HS_PHONE_NUMBER for a phone number; CHANNEL_SPECIFIC_OPAQUE_ID for channels that use their own proprietary identifiers, like Facebook Messenger or LiveChat.

value.description: A string representation of the PublicDeliveryIdentifier, either an an E.164 phone number, an email address, or a channel-specific identifier.

type.description: The type of identifier. HS_EMAIL_ADDRESS for email addresses; HS_PHONE_NUMBER for a phone number; CHANNEL_SPECIFIC_OPAQUE_ID for channels that use their own proprietary identifiers, like Facebook Messenger or LiveChat.

value.description: A string representation of the PublicDeliveryIdentifier, either an an E.164 phone number, an email address, or a channel-specific identifier.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the Hubspot Conversations API

type.description: The type of identifier. HS_EMAIL_ADDRESS for email addresses; HS_PHONE_NUMBER for a phone number; CHANNEL_SPECIFIC_OPAQUE_ID for channels that use their own proprietary identifiers, like Facebook Messenger or LiveChat.

value.description: A string representation of the PublicDeliveryIdentifier, either an an E.164 phone number, an email address, or a channel-specific identifier.

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
